projects.name: Bar 101 Game
projects.description: A dystopian narrative game where you play a bartender in a surveillance state. Powered by generative AI, Bar 101 creates dialogue, visuals, and voice—offering 100+ unique endings and high replayability with minimal manual content.

projects.name: Sigma 18 Mobile
projects.description: A mobile adaptation of my mini game that has won Gynvael's Winter GameDev Challenge 2018/19. Tailored for touch interfaces, this version brings the captivating puzzle mechanics of Sigma 18 to smartphones.

projects.name: Desk HUD
projects.description: A handy side monitor with a touch screen that helps stay organized, control smart devices, and access essential features like a todo list and calendar right from your desk.

projects.name: Ollie - Corporate Onboarding Assistant
projects.description: An AI-powered assistant built to accelerate my onboarding by answering questions using internal sources like Confluence, Slack, Jira, OpsLevel, and GitLab.

projects.name: Term-800
projects.description: An AI-powered sysadmin chatbot that lets you manage servers through natural conversation—automating tasks, analyzing systems, and executing commands over SSH.

projects.name: Brass Thumb Pomodoro
projects.description: A steampunk-inspired Arduino Pomodoro timer, featuring a vintage gauge, mechanical thumb-up signal, and 3D printed components for enhanced productivity.

projects.name: Apartments Data Analysis
projects.description: Analysis of apartments prices based on self-scrapped data. It includes machine learning model to estimate prices based on various apartment characteristics.

projects.name: Dev Jobs Data Analysis
projects.description: Analysis of job offers for software engineers based on self-scrapped data. Including salaries, technologies, and locations trends.

projects.name: NodePad
projects.description: A simple tool to manage life cycle of NodeJs apps. It allow to deploy, start/stop and monitor multiple apps via web interface or REST API.

projects.name: Sigma 18
projects.description: My mini game that has won Gynvael's Winter GameDev Challenge 2018/19.

projects.name: JsBattle
projects.description: JavaScript Programming Game inspired by RoboCode. Code logic of autonomous tank and compete with others in the multi-player league.

projects.name: Magic Mirror
projects.description: Personal assistant built into a mirror. The mirror is controlled over voice commands and a display data on its surface. It's based on Google Assistant extended by support from the custom-built intelligent home system (sensors, lights control, security, etc...)

projects.name: Jamro.net
projects.description: The website that you are currently looking at. Nothing more, nothing less :)

projects.name: Air Sensor
projects.description: Arduino-based air quality sensor. The device detects PM2.5 particles and keeps the history of records. It is a simple and effective way to be aware of air quality in a polluted city.

projects.name: Zumo Robot
projects.description: A robot based on the Zumo platform. It has been equipped with a distance sensor to navigate through the floor, avoiding obstacles. It hangs around, exploring all the nooks and crannies of the apartment.

projects.name: Hyperpath
projects.description: Hyperpath is a fast-thinking strategy game. Take on the role of the commander. Go to a battle with unknown races from distant corners of the universe. Develop skills of your fleet and lead your army to victory.

projects.name: Monsters in Bunnyland
projects.description: It's a fun, physics-based puzzle game. Two monsters have found themselves in the wrong place. Use your brain and help them getting out.

projects.name: Cargo Bridge
projects.description: That game will test your construction skills. Build a bridge and help your workers to collect items located on the other side of the valley. The game also offers a level designer and a library of community levels, ensuring endless fun.
